data.title: pizza time
data.text: Nice place and good food fast. Better then your average pizza. Other menu items also but I like the pizza.

data.title: What A Surprise
data.text: After seeing this place for years, okay let's try it. The quality is very good, the food arrived (home delivery) piping hot. And they have a pretty extensive menu. It is now our regular home delivery call.

data.title: HORRIBLE!!!!
data.text:
If I could rate this a zero I would. 

I have ordered from this place more than a few times, but the last time I was treated so HORRIBLY that I will never go back.

When the delivery boy came to my door he forgot the receipt. No big deal go get it and bring it back so I can sign. When I open the pizza to look at it I find a long hair IN THE CHEESE. I immediately call the place and tell them I will not be eating this one and that I want another. They say okay and tell me they will give me a credit. When the delivery boy comes back he has a new pizza. He gives me the receipt and asks me to sign. I ask him why I am signing to pay for my pizza. He has no clue that I was given a credit. I call the store back and they begin to tell me that I ordered another pizza and they cannot credit the current one. That they replaced it and I do not get it for free. I explain that at this point in time I have waited over an hour for a pizza and this is ridiculous. They tell me they will have to call their manager to approve the free pizza. I give the hairy pizza back to the delivery boy and tell him his co workers said for him to wait while they call the manager. I waited for OVER 15 minutes. I check to see if the delivery boy was still here. NOPE... HE DECIDED TO LEAVE.... I called the store back and they say its all taken care of. THEY NEVER CALLED ME BACK I HAD TO CALL THEM. 

Now... 3 days later I am still being charged AND they state I got two pizzas. 

NEVER EVER EAT HERE UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE OVERCHARGED AND ACCUSED OF STEALING.

data.title: Awesome Italian food!
data.text: I haven't found anything better than this little hidden gem.  Pizza is unique and flavorful.  Authentic NY style.  The marinara sauce on the pasta is the best!  Friendly staff, fast delivery...all around a great experience.

data.title: Great NY-Style Pizza!!
data.text: Absolutely the best NY style pizza in Orange County!  If you want the real thing, this is it.  I should know-I'm a native NYer!  (Don't bother with the negative review below.  Probably used to the California/veggie  or Chicago pizzas.)

data.title: Should not even be called pizza !
data.text: This is not very good pizza pass if you can and try another!

data.title: excelente!
data.text: Adorei conhecer essa pizzaria. Lugar fantástico, bem decorado, variedade de sabores e recheios e tudo de alta qualidade. Variedade no cardápio
